title: Exploring The Suicide of Rachel Foster
description: The Suicide of Rachel Foster is a 2020 adventure video game that delves into mystery and emotional storytelling as players navigate a haunted hotel. Set in 1993, the protagonist Nicole investigates the circumstances surrounding a tragic past involving her family's history and a young girl's suicide.
prompt: An informative diagram illustrating the key elements of The Suicide of Rachel Foster. Include visual components such as the Timberline Hotel, a timeline of events from Nicole's past, and symbols representing mystery and investigation. Use a clean, professional style with clear labels for important elements, and a cool color scheme to convey the game's atmospheric and somber themes.
